entities.description: A broad category covering aspects related to mental health, including adult and adolescent mental health and depression.
Mental health aspects related to adults, including recorded and imputed data.
Mental health aspects related to adolescents, including depression.
A mental health condition that is analyzed for both adults and adolescents, with recorded and imputed data.
The utilization of mental health services, with recorded and imputed data.
Experiences and behaviors of youth, including recorded ones.
A broad category covering various health-related topics, including recorded and imputed data, and emerging issues.
Recent or new health issues that are recorded and imputed.
Data related to the COVID-19 pandemic, including recorded cases.
Data related to drug use, nicotine dependence, and substance use disorder.
Dependence on nicotine, including data related to substance use disorder.
A disorder related to the use of substances, such as drugs and alcohol.

relationships.description: Includes data related to adult mental health.
Includes data related to adolescent mental health.
Includes data related to depression in both adults and adolescents.
Data about the utilization of mental health services.
Includes recorded data on the experiences and behaviors of youth.
Includes data on new and emerging health issues.
Includes data related to the COVID-19 pandemic.
Contains data related to nicotine dependence.
Contains data related to substance use disorder.
